P

PageDataGrabber - Class in sv.grabber.productdatacrc1
The Page Data Grabber retrieves actual data (size, price, discount, availability, color, etc) for particular set of product variations from CRC product pages and outputs the results to different targets including SQLite database (see PageDataGrabber).
PageDataGrabber() - Constructor for class sv.grabber.productdatacrc1.PageDataGrabber
Reads initial configuration (products, their sizes to search for, their parameters to retrieve and common parameters of products) from binary files [data/crc_*.dat], if no DAT files, reads initial data from text files [data/crc_*.cfg] and creates needed tables in the DB if do not exist yet.
PageDataGrabber.SizeType - Enum in sv.grabber.productdatacrc1
 
parsePagesAndShowBrief() - Method in class sv.grabber.productdatacrc1.PageDataGrabber
Retrieves actual product data from pages and prints in brief format.
parsePagesAndShowDetailed() - Method in class sv.grabber.productdatacrc1.PageDataGrabber
Retrieves actual product data from pages and prints in detailed format.
parsePagesAndToCsv() - Method in class sv.grabber.productdatacrc1.PageDataGrabber
Retrieves actual product data from pages and outputs data of each page in a separated CSV file.
parsePagesAndToDb() - Method in class sv.grabber.productdatacrc1.PageDataGrabber
Retrieves actual product data from pages and stores them in the DB.
printAllProductData(String) - Method in class sv.grabber.productdatacrc1.DatabaseSource
 
printCollectedDbData() - Method in class sv.grabber.productdatacrc1.PageDataGrabber
Prints out all collected product data from the DB.
printCurrentData() - Method in class sv.grabber.productdatacrc1.PageDataGrabber
Prints currently used configuration (products, their sizes to search for, their parameters to retrieve and common parameters of products).
PRODUCT_STATS_TABLE - Static variable in class sv.grabber.productdatacrc1.DatabaseSource
 
ProductDataset - Class in sv.grabber.productdatacrc1
Implementation of product data set to store product configuration for search.
ProductDataset(String, String, String, String[], String[]) - Constructor for class sv.grabber.productdatacrc1.ProductDataset
 
PRODUCTS_TABLE - Static variable in class sv.grabber.productdatacrc1.DatabaseSource
 
putConfigurationToCfgFiles() - Method in class sv.grabber.productdatacrc1.PageDataGrabber
Writes currently used configuration data (products, their sizes to search for, their parameters to retrieve and common parameters of products) to CFG files [data/crc_*.cfg].
putConfigurationToDatFiles() - Method in class sv.grabber.productdatacrc1.PageDataGrabber
Writes currently used configuration data (products, their sizes to search for, their parameters to retrieve and common parameters of products) to DAT files [data/crc_*.dat].
putLinksToFile(ArrayList<String[]>, boolean) - Static method in class sv.grabber.productdatacrc1.GrabberFileManipulator
 
putPageItemsToFile(ArrayList<String[]>, boolean) - Static method in class sv.grabber.productdatacrc1.GrabberFileManipulator
